function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for significant forward transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Overwhelm critical care hospital capacities and long-term care facilities, leading to increased deaths and morbidities","Mitigation":"Implement early warning systems to reduce hospital surges and flatten the curve of infection transmission","Technologies":"Syndromic surveillance, wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of accurate information on the proportion of the total population that remains uninfected","Impact":"Inability to effectively allocate resources and plan containment strategies","Mitigation":"Enhance community-wide monitoring and surveillance using WBE to complement diagnostic testing","Technologies":"Community-wide monitoring, diagnostic testing, WBE","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Decreased willingness to comply with government recommendations for distancing and self-isolation","Impact":"Increased community spread of contagious diseases and difficulty in controlling outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement near-real-time community-wide monitoring to increase community connectedness and sense of purpose","Technologies":"Community-wide monitoring, syndromic surveillance, WBE","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
